product_name: REI 2-in-1 Home and Car USB Charger
long_description: The REI 2-in-1 Home and Car USB charger is for use at home, and is compact and easy to take along in the car, too. The USB port charges your portable phones and small electronic devices. Protective cover hides the car adaptor when not in use; AC plug flips out when you need it. Output voltage: AC 5.0V / DC900mA. Output current: 5V 850mA.
short_description: The REI 2-in-1 Home and Car USB charger is for use at home, and is compact and easy to take along in the car, too. The USB port charges your portable phones and small electronic devices.
